page.title: 18PLANTS AND TREES
page.content: As a part of the domesday project we have to look at plants and trees. We found a lot in rough ground round about the school and beside the Barons football team changing rooms. {There were:}buttercups round about trees thistle and nettles were mostly round the outside of fields and banks. Julian from Aden country park helped us identify all the flowers that we found.{Forget-me-nots}were beside several trees round about the outside of roads and tracks.{Cow parsly:}is everywhere round about the outside of parks,roads,tracks and everything round about Auchnagatt.{Speedwell:} were quite rare they were only in rough ground and in grass.Trees were round about high ground and farms. {BY {ANGELA,CHRIS AND GORDON. {
